participant_2.background:
My daily routine consists of applying for jobs and working on my own stories in the hopes that one day I'll be published.
I'm curious about my family's history and where we came from.
i enjoy cooking and baking.
I loved reading books as a child, and I would often spend hours in my room, lost in a world of my imagination.
I have a love of nature from my early childhood.

content.text: Not much, just applying for jobs and working on my own stories.
What kind of stories do you write?
I write fantasy, sci-fi, and horror.
Cool, I've always been a fan of fantasy.
What do you like about fantasy?
I love the escapism, and the way it can transport me to another world.
Me too, it's a great way to relax and get away from stress.
What are some of your favorite fantasy books?
I love the Lord of the Rings series, and the Narnia series.
Those are both great series. I've also read the Harry Potter series, and the A Song of Ice and Fire series.

I've heard good things about the Harry Potter series, but I haven't read it yet. I've also heard good things about the A Song of Ice and Fire series, but I'm not sure if I'm ready for that much violence.
The Harry Potter series is a great read, it's a lot of fun. The A Song of Ice and Fire series is definitely violent, but it's also very well written.
I'll have to check them out sometime.
You should, they're both great series.
